sense.gloss: retiring high-ranking government officials taking a lucrative job in a private or semi-private corporation
command (from superior to inferior, government to private sector, etc.), order, imposition

sdata.j: ↑日本↑↓にっぽん↓の↑官僚↑↓かんりょう↓↑達↑↓たち↓は↑国家↑↓こっか↓が↑破綻↑↓はたん↓するまで↑天下↑↓|あまくだ↓り|を↑続↑↓つづ↓けて↑税金↑↓ぜいきん↓をむさぼる↑国賊↑↓こくぞく↓に↑過↑↓す↓ぎない！
sdata.e: Japanese bureaucrats are nothing but traitors to the country who covet our tax money and will continue the practice of amakudari until the country is bankrupt.
